thread.title: Christy Sackett
thread.title_full: Advance Funds Network reviewed by Christy Sackett

author: Christy Sackett
title: Christy Sackett
text: Scott was a rock star! He helped me work through the minimal paperwork and was with me all the way. I feel like he actually cared about my business and I would strongly recommend him and his company! If I could give him 10 stars I would! Thanks Scott for your professionalism and expediency.
